verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> They that <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be as <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> which <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H4131>removed,<s%> but <S%H3427>abideth<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

As the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is round <S%H5439>about<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H4480>henceforth<s%> <S%H6258><s%> even <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of the <S%H7562>wicked<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5117>rest<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> <S%H4616>lest<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> unto <S%H5766>iniquity.<s%>
Do <S%H3190>good,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> unto those that be <S%H2896>good,<s%> and to them that are <S%H3477>upright<s%> in their <S%H3826>hearts.<s%>

As for such as turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> unto their crooked <S%H6128>ways,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall lead them <S%H1980>forth<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity:<s%> but <S%H7965>peace<s%> shall be <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
